review: We have been members of prime all year but never used the streaming service until we bought the Fire TV stick.  We have been very very pleased with it!  It keeps track of where you were in every show you are watching so you can get right back to where you were.  Just wish there was an easy way to display Web pages with it, then it would be a 5 star rating.
author: Mark L McGranahan
